website_summaries.verdict: A good choice is you want an alternative design to the Series models. Otherwise, choose the Series 7 if value is your top concern.
pros: A basic waterproof electric shaver with an ergonomic, slip-free handle
Only takes around an hour to charge for 45 minutes of shave time
cons: Doesn't have a docking station or offer cleaning and lubricating capabilities like the Series models

customer_reviews.title: Not as close shave as I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a different version of Braun shaver that broke. I like the pivoting head but ... it does not really provide a close shave like my old one. I mostly use it for my head. I also purchased a replacement head for this and as someone suggested, I think the original head that comes with this is not as good as the replacement one so I may try to replace the head but by the time you add up the cost of this shaver plus purchasing a replacement head just to get a normal shave .. not such a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: carmens kindle 3

customer_reviews.title: Great wet shaver!
customer_reviews.text: I have Central Pain Syndrome which makes shaving very painful. This razor is fantastic. I use it as a wet razor with shaving cream, to reduce the risk of irritation. If you're used to shaving with a safety razor, it will seem a little weird at first, but stick with it. It's easy to clean, charges quickly and gives plenty of shaves on a single charge. I highly recommend this razor.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Shaves pretty well, my previous Braun lasted about 20 years
customer_reviews.text: Shaves pretty well, my previous Braun lasted about 20 years. Doubt this one will last that long. I just wish you could use it while it is plugged in, so you are not so dependent upon the battery charge.
customer_reviews.author: Reid

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shaver at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I like the Braun brand and have had several of them. This works great! As a retiree I don't need to shave every day. Other models had trouble with 2 and 3 days beards and long hairs, no problem for this shaver
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Jahn

customer_reviews.title: Beware warranty details and vulnerability to battery
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfectly acceptable shaver, but after only a year of use, the battery will not charge. Since it will not operate with the power-cord plugged in, this makes the unit a brick. Although under warranty, I am told that I need to mail the unit to a repair location in another state - and can expect to wait several weeks to get it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ben F Noviello

customer_reviews.title: Good shave
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a dependable shaver. Does a great job too. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cobbcatz

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works well with cream or oil but causes irritation when dry!
customer_reviews.author: Brad P

customer_reviews.title: Great product . Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver for travel . Great battery life . Great shower shaver .
customer_reviews.author: Dahel Salazar

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES this shaver!! The price is right as well! They have this same product at Ulta for $112.00. Buy it! You'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wbevie

customer_reviews.title: It's The Devil's Shaver ;)
customer_reviews.text: WOW x 2. The best shave i've ever had. super fast, clean, leaves your skin silky smooth. worth way much then it cost. superb quality. do not hesitate. buy it.
customer_reviews.author: doron mckeithen

customer_reviews.title: GOOD Value
customer_reviews.text: Good razor for the money. You get a pretty close shave.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hartigan

customer_reviews.title: Great cost-benefit, simple yet works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Has been using it for a few days and already can see the difference it brings. Wild certainly recommend it for its cost-benefit. It is simply one of the options that consumer can choose from which gives great value within its price range.
customer_reviews.author: Chun Hay NG

customer_reviews.title: Good ergonomics, battery life
customer_reviews.text: I've had this shaver for about a month. I bought it to replace a 10 year old Braun that is starting to wear out. My old Braun is built like a tank and has NiMh batteries. The Waterflex shaver is much lighter and more ergonomic than the older model. The battery life is also much better with the Li-Ion battery. I also like the ergonomics better. It is more comfortable in the hand, with a better shape and the angle of the head making it easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hetzel

customer_reviews.title: Better than rotary
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver! This is so much better that a rotary that I had before. I have sensitave skin and I get a nice close shave, whether dry or with lather. I can also just splash a little water and grab a quick touch-up shave. The pop-up trimmer is real handy. It's easy to clean. The head pops off and the whiskers fall out nicely - or just run it under the water stream.
customer_reviews.author: wkt

customer_reviews.title: but then I would have to charge you to see my beautiful face! I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would post a picture on how well it works on my face, but then I would have to charge you to see my beautiful face! I would highly recommend, works as advertised. I use it in the shower most the time, no issues so far! First time owning an electric shaver so I don't have much to compare it to, I know it just saves me money on buying razor blades!
customer_reviews.author: CMorgan

customer_reviews.title: this was nothing but disappointment. My beard feels like this is the first ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using wet dry shavers for the last fifteen years and this was my third braun brand wet/dry shaver. Unfortunately, this was nothing but disappointment. My beard feels like this is the first time I've ever used electric shaver and it has been like this for the last three weeks. I am about to throw it in the garbage and use my old braun series 3 that I had bought two years ago. It still shaves better than this new one!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Not close enough
customer_reviews.text: Failed to meet the buzz and high reviews. Just doesn't compete with a traditional razor. Misses a lot of hairs on any curves and especially the neck. Other electric razors with three small heads work better but still fail to shave as close/good as a blade.
customer_reviews.author: maybeifuwant2

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: If you actually use this thing regularly in wet areas, do not expect it to last long. I cleaned and oiled it regularly yet something still managed to get gummed up somewhere. I wa not able to clean it without disassembling the body of the razor.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good decision
customer_reviews.text: It took a while for me to get adjusted to the Waterflex. I had been using the S3 for many years and the feeling is quite different. I have not noticed any difference in the shave, but cleaning the Waterflex is much easier that it was with the S3.
customer_reviews.author: Vootsak

customer_reviews.title: A great shaver! I lost the power cord about 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: A great shaver! I lost the power cord about 30 trims ago. Biding my time, but it's still running strong. (Typical shave time: <2 minutes)
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Wet, dry and prime too
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new razor for a young man. Nice razor and will be at least a good starter. Wet, dry and prime too.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: be careful
customer_reviews.text: love that you can use it in the shower but be careful with clippers, they will cut your lips if you try and trim longer hair around your mouth. pretty close shave.
customer_reviews.author: b.cole

customer_reviews.title: Braun Waterflex Wet and Dry Shaver - Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and great price compared to local retailers. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KitCat

customer_reviews.title: so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Hoped over to braun from phillips, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Lee

customer_reviews.title: but it's still a great shaver. You get the quality expected from Braun ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little longer to shave compared to my old Series 7, but it's still a great shaver. You get the quality expected from Braun shavers.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It gives a close shave and it's waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Razor
customer_reviews.text: Very nice razor. Much better than the 3 headed razor that I've been using that scrapes up my face and gives a poor shave even though I've replaced the cutters. Well pleased with this razors performance.
customer_reviews.author: JUST-JIM

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Unbeatable price too
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the shower with shave gel. Works great. Unbeatable price too.
customer_reviews.author: Rxoss87

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: if there is a case for the Braun Waterflex shaver , i will give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: leiyuze

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not A clean Shave Have to go over face with bic razor
customer_reviews.author: laurie

customer_reviews.title: Not for men with softer whiskers
customer_reviews.text: Can't spend under 120 and expect a comfortable cut with out pulling whiskers
customer_reviews.author: Jevex7

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have not been very impressed with this product. It takes a lot longer to get a clean shave that with my old braun shaver. Feels a lot more like a face massage than a shaving experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Really bad.
customer_reviews.text: Really suprised at this razor terrible performance. I had a $15 razor that lasted 10 years and died after I droped it. I loved how close it cut. The Braun cuts terrible dry or wet. Truly a waste of $70.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Wizell

product_meta.title: Braun Series Waterflex Wet and Dry Shaver Electric Shaver for Men WF2S; Rechargeable Electric Razor, Blue
product_meta.description: The new Braun WaterFlex electric razor gives you an incredibly smooth and precise shave, along with the flexibility to shave where and how you want. WaterFlex’s Contour Adaptive shaving head easily adapts around the jaw line and under the chin, and the ActiveLift middle trimmer captures flat-lying hair in problem areas. Wet & Dry technology means WaterFlex shavers can be used under the shower—and even with foams or gels—allowing you to shave whatever way you like best.
feature_bullets: Worlds No 1 Foil Shaver Brand *Based on global Braun value share in electric foil shaver market from May 2013 to April 2014. Source: Leading market research institute
Official Electric Shaver of the NFL
For an unbeatably close*, smooth feeling. Works with foam. (*Tested against leading competitive products in the same class)
Wet and Dry, for flexibility to shave where and how you want
Head swivels 33 degrees for ultimate adaptation around jaw, chin and neck.
